divs: sighting detailsit was 9:50 pm on 2\4\11, it was a cloudy night and i was driving to olney, md to go to work. at the intersection from fieldcrest road to route 108 i noticed what at first i thought was just a spot light hitting the cloud cover above. the light was going in a circular motion that looked much like when you see a spot light at a construction site being projected in the air. i thought nothing of it, stopped at the traffic light and i turned right on 108 to head towards olney md. after driving for a minute i noticed the light was in front of me again and i could see it moving in the same circular motion, covering a lot of ground as it made each complete circle and at the same time moving forward with each circle it completed, heading in the same direction towards olney. i put down my windows and heard no sound from above, the clouds seemed to be kinda low so my only guess is maybe a helicopter could have been above it shinning a spot light down and moving it in a circular motion while it was traveling the same direction i was traveling. however i do not feel this is the case since looking at the oval shapped light it seemed as if it was glowing and having some sort of mass rather then being just a point of light being projected from above. i really do not know what i saw however its characteristics such as the way it moved acrossed the sky was significantly different from a plane or a helicopter. why would an air craft make spiral like motions to move from point a to b? the object finally went out of my sights as it headed towards sandy spring, md. at that time i had turned into work. it was certainly an odd thing to see.
Summary: I saw a light above the clouds moving in a circular motion across a span of 6 miles
